scene_metadata.title: The Yearning to Understand
scene_metadata.philosophical_depth: the limits of knowing how to proceed

dialogue.text: I would like to dig deeper into the door thing, but I don't really know how.

psychological_notes: Evan expresses the universal dilemma of spiritual seeking - wanting to go deeper but not knowing the method. This honest admission of not knowing how is itself a doorway. The desire to understand coupled with the humility of uncertainty creates the perfect conditions for genuine discovery.
philosophical_underpinning: The admission of not knowing how is often the beginning of knowing
therapeutic_direction: Sitting with the uncertainty rather than rushing to fill it with methods
